sentences.en: Alex jumped up so violently that he overturned his glass of sherry.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯一下子暴跳起来，结果把他那杯雪利酒都打翻了。

sentences.en: He lunged at me, grabbing me violently.
sentences.cn: 他向我扑过来，使劲把我抓住。

sentences.en: He reacted violently only under provocation .
sentences.cn: 只因为被激怒，他才暴力相向。

sentences.en: Her heart beat violently when she received the letter.
sentences.cn: 接到这封信,她的心跳得很厉害.

sentences.en: In his anger he grasped the child and shook him violently.
sentences.cn: 愤怒之下,他抓住孩子狠命地摇.

sentences.en: In Petersburg, 30 patrolmen have died violently in the past five years.
sentences.cn: 在彼得斯堡，过去5年中有30名巡警死于暴力事件。

sentences.en: My heart suddenly began beating violently.
sentences.cn: 我的心突然开始猛烈地跳动.

sentences.en: Nausea surged in him and he retched violently.
sentences.cn: 他突然觉得恶心，猛烈地干呕起来。

sentences.en: Several people have been violently attacked in the subway.
sentences.cn: 有几个人在地铁里受到了暴力袭击。

sentences.en: She became so nervous that she shook violently.
sentences.cn: 她太紧张了，浑身抖得厉害。

sentences.en: Some opposition activists have been violently attacked.
sentences.cn: 一些反对派的积极分子受到了暴力袭击。

sentences.en: The prisoner's limbs flailed violently because of the pain.
sentences.cn: 那囚犯因为疼痛,四肢剧烈地抖动着.

sentences.en: They have been violently advocating neutrality.
sentences.cn: 他们一直激烈地鼓吹中立.

trans.tran_cn: 激烈地，暴力地，狂暴地，极度地
trans.tran_en: with a lot of force in a way that is very difficult to control
